lst.name: sentence
lst.str: <Teck Corp> said it was continuing talks about joining a joint copper venture at Highland Valley, British Columbia, held by affiliates Cominco Ltd <CLT> and <Lornex Mining Corp>, but did not know when negotiations would be completed.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Teck vice-president of administration John Guminski said in reply to a query that the talks had been "ongoing for a long time."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: For the six months following July 1, 1986, when the venture officially started production, Highland Valley had total ore milled of 22.6 mln short tons, grading an average of 0.41 pct copper, Townson said.
